channel.title: Help please, two things [pi] rep+
channel.description:
*[PI]*
1. how if i did the tut on making things all go in right slot by name like platelegs..body..helm etc.. would i also be able to do it by number because i can't get custom items or dragon platebody using that way even with "Dragon platebody".
2. can someone post their method in eniteydef for adding npcs with one example in it
~ please remember that this is a [PI] client

item.title: Help please, two things [pi] rep+
